column5: Went out on the bay yesterday water was pretty muddy.  Did alright though was out for about 6 hours caught about a dozen jumbos.  Enough for a decent hut lunch will have to get out again once the water clears. Tons of huts out there already about a hundred.  Sorry about the quality of the pics i still havent got a new camera.
Nice report and pics...even if they are a bit dark.  Glad to see people gettin out there despite the cold and wind.  Great job!
NOw thats a sweet gig u got going there catch them and eat them on the spot. Nice report, and looks good.     jordan
Thanks Lickypits.   The pic quality actually adds to the feeling.
Ummmmmm.   I can smell 'em cookin.  Pretty tasty on a cold winter's day.
A dozen perch that size is a really decent day on the bay. Nice report, looks like a tasty meal!
